Welcome to Starship’s documentation!

Welcome to the documentation of Starship, an innovative learning platform designed for secondary level students eager to delve into the fascinating world of programming.

Starship transcends traditional online learning platforms by creating a vibrant, community driven ecosystem where young aspirants can unmask the world of programming, collaborate with peers, and shape their tech-future.

Exploring this documentation will give you a comprehensive understanding of the different functionalities and features that make Starship unique. Primed to not just offer a vast array of practical courses, Starship also encourages active participation with an engaging point-based system and encourages real-world application of skills with a dedicated project platform.

Moreover, you will find details on our cutting-edge AI-based teaching assistant, designed to customize learning paths, clarify complex concepts, and deliver personalized suggestions. Information on our comprehensive portfolio builder, and the real-world implications of your involvement in Starship will also be available.

This documentation serves as a valuable resource in your journey with Starship as you traverse the enchanting realms of programming. Welcome aboard Starship and prepare for an intriguing adventure that blends learning with growth and innovation.
